00010 #if !defined(Apoxi_TriggerTimer_hpp)

00015 #include <Auxiliary/Macros.hpp>
00016 #include <Kernel/Timer.hpp>
00017 
00018 template <class T> class TriggerTimer : public Timer {
00019     typedef Timer Base;
00020 
00021     public:
00022         TriggerTimer();
00023         TriggerTimer(T *t, UINT32 timeout, BOOLEAN autotimer = FALSE);
00024         virtual ~TriggerTimer();
00025 
00026         void Init(T *t, UINT32 timeout, BOOLEAN autotimer = FALSE);
00027 
00028     protected:
00029         virtual void OnTimer();
00030 
00031     private:
00032         T   *m_t;
00033 };

00035 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036     TriggerTimer
00037     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00038 template <class T>
00039 TriggerTimer<T>::TriggerTimer() : 
00040     m_t(0) 
00041 {
00042 }   // TriggerTimer
00043 
00044 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045     TriggerTimer
00046     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00047 template <class T>
00048 TriggerTimer<T>::TriggerTimer(T *t, UINT32 timeout, BOOLEAN autotimer) :
00049     Base(timeout, autotimer), 
00050     m_t(t) 
00051 {
00052 }   // TriggerTimer
00053 
00054 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055     ~TriggerTimer
00056     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00057 template <class T>
00058 TriggerTimer<T>::~TriggerTimer()
00059 {
00060     m_t = 0;
00061 }   // ~TriggerTimer
00062 
00063 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00064     Init
00065     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00066 template <class T>
00067 void TriggerTimer<T>::Init(T *t, UINT32 timeout, BOOLEAN autotimer) 
00068 {
00069     Base::Init(timeout, autotimer);
00070     m_t = t;
00071 }   // Init
00072 
00073 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00074     OnTimer
00075     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00076 template <class T>
00077 void TriggerTimer<T>::OnTimer()
00078 {
00079     ASSERT(m_t != 0);
00080     m_t->OnTimer();
00081 }   // OnTimer
